result.execSummary:
The defendant Randall L. Mapes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct - Loud, Boisterous or Profane Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In the event probation is revoked, Defendant would be entitled to Good Time Credit and Huber Privileges.
Concurrent with: Any other sentence currently being served.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.

Defendant to complete an Anger Managment Program whether it be the Domestic Abuse Alternatives Program or another program as coordinated by the supervising agent together with any follow through counseling and/or treatment as deemed appropriate by the supervising agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Disorderly Conduct - Loud, Boisterous or Profane Conduct
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randall L. Mapes

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: SDC Letter returned undeliverable/unable to forward
RN & SDCL, remailed to new address

ADDRESS INFO for Randall L. Mapes
Current: PO Box 1060, Wautoma, WI 54982 United States  (Effective: 06-30-2017)
Prior: PO Box 214, 313 S. Scott Street #B, Wautoma, WI 54982

Case called @ 1:48 p.m. Defendant Randall L. Mapes in court with attorney David Paul Frank Templeton.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Upon motion of the State the Court amends Count 1 to Disorderly Conduct - Loud, Boisterous or Profane Behavior.   Plea: NC. Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Repeater enhancer dismissed. Statement by the victim who appears telephonically. Statement regarding sentencing by Atty Templeton. No statement by DE. Court orders: 90 days WCJ - Huber, GT, No CFTS - I/S - 1 year probation concurrent to any other sentence currently being served - Conditions: Anger Managment Program to be coordinated by supervising agent, defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician, Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP. Appeal rights given.

Prior: 313 S. Scott Street #b, Wautoma, WI 54982
by USPS - No Mail Receptacle - Unable to Forward

2:24 pm case called. Defendant Randall L. Mapes in court with attorney David Paul Frank Templeton.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions counsel regarding status. Attorney Templeton makes statement regarding bond modification request. Statement by ADA Anderson regarding no contact request-no objection to modification of bond. Court honors request for bond modification.  Status conference scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 03:20 pm.
from the victim requesting no contact condition of bond be lifted

Case called @ 1:06 p.m.  Defendant Randall L. Mapes in court, in custody, appears via video with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel. Defendant will be represented by SPD. ADA Anderson - DE is on a PO Hold, requesting $1000 Sig bond. Atty Szilagyi has no position on bond. Court orders $1000 Sig Bond.  NGP entered.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.  Status conference scheduled for April 2, 2015 at 02:20 pm.
